Articles.Content:
Here it is! My full-size Falcon 9 and Dragon V2 replica!

Launch album:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Thanks to Zucal for the engine pods and to RevanCorana for the lettering!

It is very hard to land the first stage, but if you want to try (If you do get it to work post the images here! I want to see.) stop burning when you have 1,000 m/s of delta-v and then boost back. Good luck!

The real falcon is 3.6 meters in diameter. This is 3.75 meters.

Landing the capsule is fairly easy, remember to extend the landing gear.

Enjoy!

Download

Edited July 6, 2015 by Mad Rocket Scientist
Wow, that capsule+ trunk is pretty... really nice job, and plus rep!

Wow, that capsule+ trunk is pretty... really nice job, and plus rep!

Thanks!

I wish the solar panels covered the trunk better.
